abstract: Minnesota federal officials deny extension request by Gov Mark Dayton, who must upgrade state drivers licenses to meet standards outlined by Real ID Act in order to board planes.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials denied Gov. Mark Dayton’s request for more time to comply with stronger driver’s license standards to board planes.

headline.main: Minnesota: No Extra Time for Driver’s License Upgrade
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: No Extra Time for Driver’s License Upgrade

snippet: Federal officials denied Gov. Mark Dayton’s request for more time to comply with stronger driver’s license standards to board planes.
